pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 1, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, February 1, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will mark the completion of masonry work on the West Block by installing the last stone to the exterior of Mackenzie Tower.

West Block security trailer
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:45 p.m.
